dct_title_s: L'AMERIQUE Selon les nouvelles observations de Messrs. de l'Academie des Sciences, etc
dct_description_sm: Title cartouche engraved by: J. Goeree delin, J. Baptist sculp. (lower left).
California as a large island with broad, indented northern coast. Mainland coast to the east is also very jagged.
Title cartouche with bow-carrying female native in foreground, and village natives practicing canibalism. (lower left).
L.C. 3485; Wheat 95; Tooley 71(Plate 54); Leighly 124,140; Koeman,I, Aa6(42); Koeman,I,Aa9(v.63).

Added title above map: AMERICA IN PRAECIPUAS IPSIUS PARTES DISTRIBUTA, AD OBSERVATIONES ACADEMIAE REGIAE SCIENTIARUM, ET EXQUISITISSIMAS TABULAS, QUAE NUNQUAM ANTEHAC LUCEM VIDERUNT, EXCUSA A PETRO VAN DER AA, CUM PRIVILEGIO ORDINUM HOLLANDIAE ET WESTFRISIAE.
Issued in: La Galerie Agreable du Monde / Pierre vander Aa, [1729].
Issued in: Le Nouveau Theatre du Monde, ou la Geographie Royale / Pierre van der Aa, 1713.
